variableDescription: What is your sex at birth?
How old are you?
Which country are you from?
What is your highest level of (completed) education?
Choose your type of residence
How often do you eat the following meat products (last 3 months)? - Fresh-cut poultry such as wings, breast, drumsticks or roast from chicken or turkey
How often do you eat the following meat products (last 3 months)? - Fresh-cut beef such as steak, roast beef, pot roast, corned beef, beef short ribs
How often do you eat the following meat products (last 3 months)? - Fresh-cut pork such as pork chops, spare ribs, baby back ribs, pork tenderloin, etc.

How often do you eat the following meat products (last 3 months)? - Processed pork, beef or poultry products such as sandwich, bacon, ham, hamburgers, lasagna, hotdog, sausages, pepperoni, salami, bologna etc.
How often do you eat the following meat products (last 3 months)? - Other meat such as duck, lamb, goat, goose, rabbit, venison, bison, liver, etc.
If you were to eat less meat, what would be the motivating reason? (You can choose multiple answers) - Animal welfare
If you were to eat less meat, what would be the motivating reason? (You can choose multiple answers) - Environmental reasons
If you were to eat less meat, what would be the motivating reason? (You can choose multiple answers) - Health reasons
How familiar are you with the term "cultured meat"?
When you think of cultured meat, what first comes to your mind?
"I think cultured meat is healthy."
"I think cultured meat is environmentally friendly."
"I think cultured meat would be tasty"
"I think cultured meat is kind to animals."
"I think cultured meat is unnatural."
"I think cultured meat is disgusting"
What is the likelihood of you trying (tasting) cultured meat?
Would you purchase cultures meat at the same price as regular meat?
Would you purchase cultured meat at a higher price than regular meat?
Would you purchase cultured meat at a lower price than regular meat?
